Menter

Do you often feel depressed and unmotivated?
We know what to do! Menter will help you track mood changing and improve
the entire mental condition. Psychologists suggest controlling it and thank
yourself at the end of the day to feel better and fight the depression.
Thus, we prepared for you a real 2-in-1!
Mood tracker and hank You Diary in one app!
This is all you need to think positively!
Download on the
App Store

WHAT CAN OUR APPLICATION DO?

Menter helps track mood during the long time period to learn the dynamic. You can easily add a note whenever you feel happy, depressed, jealous and so on!
Thank You Diary is one more workable tool, which can help you fight negative thoughts and start thinking positively.
You can choose the most matching affirmations to start each day properly, focusing on something really important and reasonable.

3 REASONS TO CHOOSE MENTER
We have added many popular categories to divide your notes into groups - home, family, work and so on. You can choose the one, which matches the topic the most.
You can also set a reminder, which won’t let you forget to update the mood status. Just relax and add a new comment!
Statistics of mood and gratitude are also available. You can figure out how often you feel depressed/happy/nervous during the month and take measures in time!

MENTER HAS EVEN MORE BENEFITS...
It is indeed easy to update your mood or add a comment in Thank You Diary. The whole process takes only a few seconds!
Notifications may be always turned off, so nothing will distract you from work or leisure. Enjoy your time and come back to add something about the way you feel.
You can edit each note or comment if you need to add details or delete wrong information. No need to remove the whole entry!
